First, I pick out what to wear on top.
This part is easy because my giraffe shirt is my favorite.
Then, I have to pick out what to wear in the bottom.
I couldn't decide on pants or skirt for today.
I also think about what the weather is going to be like.
And I make sure I choose the right clothes for it.
...I'll bundle up and wear clothes that keep me warm.
And if it's warm outside, I can wear clothes that can be cool.
